talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Elf Elder$
Forgive me. I was a little startled to see you appear out of a sudden.
But I'm glad to see that you're fine.
(Elf Elder looks relieved to see that you're okay)

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9448_qu_01.ogg}
{user_nick}, what brings you here?
And where is Argenta?

${user_nick}$
(Tell him what happened)

$Elf Elder$
You ended up in the past... and the Monolith's door opened when Feder stabbed it with his sword...
If nothing happened when the Monolith was opened, then Lianna's theory must be true….
(Elf Elder turns pale)

${user_nick}$
Didn't Argenta come this way?

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9448_qu_02.ogg}
(He shakes his head)
It hasn't even been long since you left. If what you say is true, I can't say that Argenta is safe. Poison or nightmares from Mistland could have poured into this world when the door opened...

$Elf Elder$
{user_nick}, I know you must be tired after the long journey, but could you hurry to find Argenta? Our allies are already at the Abyss of Heat, so please check on the Watcher's Tower. That place can be accessed now.

$Elf Elder$
It's not a good sign that Watcher's Tower has become accessible now….
(Elf Elder looks worried)

${user_nick}$
We have allies who are strong enough to go to the Abyss of Heat?

$Elf Elder$
He didn't state his name, but he had the Ancient Dragon's jewel with him. He was wearing black armour, so the elves are calling him the Black Knight. That somehow reminds me of a person Nerwin told me about 50 years ago...

${user_nick}$
(Velskud?!)

$Elf Elder$
I will tell this Black Knight about you when he returns. For now, please go to the Watcher's Tower. We will devise a plan to deal with the Monolith.

${user_nick}$
(The Monolith is open, but I'm standing here without any harm... does that mean...)

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9448_qu_03.ogg}
(Elf Elder silently stares at you for a while before opening his mouth)
The fight is not over yet. Even if the Monolith is open, we should not stop.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9448_qu_04.ogg}
Whatever you see or experience would be your Telesia.
You will not go against your fate when you walk with your own will.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9448_qu_05.ogg}
Please do not despair even if you do not get the results that you wanted.
I'll do the same… (Elf Elder hesitates for a moment) I apologize for what happened earlier…

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Really? Does that mean you won't shout vulgarities at each other again?
(She holds a bottle of pills for her gastric pain in her shaking hand)

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9448_qu_06.ogg}
N-no! And we weren't exactly swearing at each other….
Anyway, I have to meet His Highness now. {user_nick}, please be on your way too.
(Elf Elder blushes. It really seems like they used some harsh words when they quarrelled...)

${user_nick}$
Okay... (I hope Citridel will be fine. I should go to the Watcher's Tower.)

$Rambert$
Hmph, look at what the king has become.
But it was an unexpected gain to have weakened the seal stone.

${user_nick}$
Father?!

$Rambert${sound:npc_Rambert_9448_qu_01.ogg}
{user_nick}, my son. I didn't expect you would grow strong enough to enter the Monolith. That's impressive.
I'm glad to see your strength grow by the day.

${user_nick}$
Father... are you here to help Feder?! Do you know what he's doing?

$Rambert${sound:npc_Rambert_9448_qu_02.ogg}
Have you met the king already?
And you stayed alive. I must have underestimated my son.

${user_nick}$
Father... Feder is trying to open the Monolith now. This world may be destroyed by him.
He said it himself, that he will build a new world after scrapping this world which nothing but a figment of a dream.

$Rambert$
...

${user_nick}$
Father... we can't let him destroy this world. This is the world where we live in right now.
Please stop helping Feder.
I've seen your past. I know what happened. But...

${user_nick}$
I don't think it's the right thing to help such a king in order to gain power.
Father please... I don't want to fight you. There must be other ways you can become more powerfuL!!

$Rambert${sound:npc_Rambert_9448_qu_03.ogg}
…Hahaha! Hahahaha!
(Rambert laughs at what you said)
I didn't expect you to imagine fighting with me. So you've made up your mind, {user_nick}?

$Rambert${sound:npc_Rambert_9448_qu_04.ogg}
…Let me ask you this, {user_nick}. Have you surpassed Barnac?
Do you think being able to enter the Monolith can make you say that you're stronger than him?

${user_nick}$
Why are you so obsessed with strength?
And why do I need to surpass Barnac to be with you?

$Rambert$
(He seems a little disappointed)Is that what you want to know?
Your weak eyes are like your mother's.

${user_nick}$
(Mother...)

$Rambert$
The weak can't do anything. I'll tell you a little more since you've grown stronger.
I'll tell you how your weak mother suffered a tragic ending.

${user_nick}$
Don't you dare talk about her like that!

$Rambert$
She wasn't always weak. Your mother, who was well known as Blue Flower Shatila, was one of the best knights in Saint Haven. She was the strongest knight of her generation, and everyone in the kingdom knew her name.

${user_nick}$
She was a knight? But she couldn't even lift a sword... and she hated it when I played with weapons.

$Rambert$
(Rage starts to fill up in him)
That's because she changed! She was the only knight who could battle with me one-on-one,
and she was a beautiful woman.

$Rambert$
A few matches has made us feel as if we knew each other for decades.
We knew each other's power. There was no one else in the world who could surpass us.
We both thought the same way, but...

$Rambert$
She couldn't beat the Ancients.

${user_nick}$
What? The Ancients?!

$Rambert$
The Ancients are monsters! Their experiments even stretch over different time periods.
They were still alive in that cursed ruins! They were killing people for their experiments.

$Rambert$
Shatila and I saw the Ancients at the ruins. I don't know why but she was the only one they could lay their hands on. I was like a ghost to them. They suddenly appeared and pulled Shatila to the altar.

$Rambert$
Shatila fought hard, but she couldn't win the Ancients. I was too weak to do anything to them either. They did all the cruel experiments on her and she screamed in pain... then everything was washed up in darkness and we ended up back in the present. Thankfully Shatila was still there. But...

$Rambert$
She was no longer the person she used to be. She had become a lunatic. She couldn't recognize me, and screamed in madness. That was how the strong and noble knight had become! I was by her side, but I couldn't do anything to help her!

$Rambert$
Both Shatila's mind and body grew weak. She could no longer hold a sword. She didn't recognize me, and became a poor girl who was afraid of everything in the world.

$Rambert$
I did everything I could to help her, but there was no cure. The Ancients who did that to her were gone without a trace. I finally found their descendants, but they refused to take any responsibility for what their people had done. So I punished them accordingly.

${user_nick}$
Wh-what?!

$Rambert$
She spent her entire life training to become strong, and the Ancients ruined her for their greed and corruption. How dare their descendants try to brush me off? Scum like that should be wiped from the face of Lagendia.

$Rambert$
I vowed to kill every last Ancient, every last descendant of the Ancients, until there aren't any left. my master couldn't understand me and chased me out. But he was wrong! In the end, I became stronger than him.

${user_nick}$
Is that why you're so obsessed with strength? For revenge?

$Rambert$
If I don't avenge her, who will?
I'm sure it's only a matter of time before they turn to evil like their own ancestors!!
(Rambert's tightly clenched fist is shaking with anger)

$Rambert${sound:npc_Rambert_9448_qu_05.ogg}
As our son, you also have a duty to avenge your mother. The Ancients are not easy opponents. That's why I wanted you to become stronger.

${user_nick}$
What? Just for revenge!?
I trained hard to meet you. To become stronger than Barnac so that I can see you again…

$Rambert${sound:npc_Rambert_9448_qu_06.ogg}
That remains true. You need to have the power before you can join me. We will conquer anything, just you and me.

${user_nick}$
No! I didn't know you wanted me to become stronger for revenge!
And you say she had become a lunatic, but I didn't feel that way at all!

$Rambert$
You wouldn't say that if you knew her before she turned weak.
You wouldn't understand since all that you've seen of her was her weak side.

$Rambert$
But soon after, she told me she was pregnant with my child. The moment she learnt of her pregnacy, she calmed down. But I still couldn't accept how much she had changed.

$Rambert$
We were attacked by monsters on the way home. I fought them off, but she took the chance to run away from me. She was not herself, being shaken with fear. She ran away from me, so I abandoned her.

$Rambert$
I heard the news that she gave birth to you in some little village near Prairie Town. But I couldn't look at her... She wasn't the same person anymore. Those filthy Ancients had killed your real mother…!

${user_nick}$
Don't say anthing more about mother!
She... she feared you, but maybe things would have been different if you stayed with us!

$Rambert$
Shut your mouth! It was like another woman was mimicking her. The real Shatila died long ago. The Ancients killed her!

$Rambert${sound:npc_Rambert_9448_qu_07.ogg}
If the Goddess really exists, she should have wiped the entire race of Ancients away from this world.
I will never forgive the Ancients, and I'm sick of this world too!
I will kill whoever is related to the experiments and the Ancients. I will not leave any trace of them in this world.

${user_nick}$
What?!

$Rambert$
That's the only way I'll be satisfied. As my son, you have a duty to join me. I've already razed dozens of hidden Ancient towns, but there are still more out there.

${user_nick}$
What?! Father... How can you... Do you really think that's what mother would have wanted? She was a kind person! Though her health was not good, she was strong enough to raise me on her own!.

$Rambert$
The mad woman was all that you saw...
You don't know about her strong and noble past.

${user_nick}$
I don't know how mother was like before I was born, but she still is my mother!
She may have changed but that doesn't change the fact that she's your wife and my mother!
It would have been much better if you stayed by her side instead of avenging the Ancients...!

${user_nick}$
Mother told me everything about you even though I didn't even know what you looked like...
If you tell me that she isn't the person she used to be...
Then why did she tell me all those things about you?

$Rambert$
You're still young and naive. I know my wife! I know what's left is but an empty shell. Shatila was gone forever the moment the Ancients did their experiment. The shell that raised you is lucky I let her live in the first place...

$Rambert$
She was completely changed... she looked at me with fear in her eyes... the fear of the prey when it stares into the eyes of its predator!!!

$Rambert$
She obeyed me in fear so that I wouldn't kill her. Can you say that she is still the same person I used to love? I don't know what she would have done if you looked more like me rather than her!

${user_nick}$
No... No! No way!
Mother loved me!

$Rambert$
Looks like you weren't ready for the truth, after all.
But what I said are true.

$Rambert$
You're as stubborn as your mother. Maybe you don't take after me at all. I've already wasted enough time on you for today. We'll meet again when you're stronger.

${user_nick}$
Wait!

$Rambert${sound:npc_Rambert_9448_qu_08.ogg}
Oh Shatila... Your son is still young, but don't worry. He'll see the light soon enough. He'll realize that the only way he can avenge your death would be to kill all the Ancients...

${user_nick}$
(This isn't right...)

${user_nick}$
(Father wanted me to become stronger just for this?)

${user_nick}$
(No matter what hardships I went through, I held on to the hope of seeing my father again... But everything was for revenge?)

${user_nick}$
(I know my mother had a lonely and hard time. She was a little weird at times but it didn't matter. We were still happy.)

${user_nick}$
(Maybe things would have been different if you stayed with us. Mother always talked about you.)

${user_nick}$
(That's all I could feed my imagination with, and that made me less lonely. But when I met you for the first time, you trained me day and night without any warmth. But I still felt happy to be with you...)

${user_nick}$
(Father, what was I to you?)

${user_nick}$
(All I really wanted was to see you...)

${user_nick}$
(I was just a tool for your plans? Do you want me to accept that fate?)

${user_nick}$
(Please tell me it's a lie... I don't want to become stronger just for revenge.)

${user_nick}$
ARRRGH!!

${user_nick}$
(Suddenly my whole body is aching... and it's getting cold... argh it hurts!!)

$????$
... Are you okay..?

${user_nick}$
....?? Who's there? Where is this voice coming from?

$????$
[...Did you forget our promise?]

${user_nick}$
(...!!!!! Iona...? Iona, is that you?)

$????$
[... I... am... always...]

$????$
[ ...on....your.....side.... ]

${user_nick}$
Iona!

${user_nick}$
(There's no answer. Was I imagining things? No, it was Iona's voice!)

${user_nick}$
(You slap your cheeks with all your strength to snap yourself out of it. Your cheek feels numb with pain.)

${user_nick}$
I can't give up now. I made a promise to my father, and I also made a promise to Iona! I don't want to disappoint them!

${user_nick}$
Maybe I can convince my father in the future...

${user_nick}$
...I should do what I can first.
I should report to Elf Elder.
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

${user_nick}$
...I hope nothing happened in the meanwhile.
I should hurry back to Elf Elder.

qstep_change.comment:
강제스텝 저널 병경 74 어머니의 회상
[오늘을 뭘 하고 놀았니?] [오늘... 애들이랑 같이 계곡에 놀러갔어요] [그래? 검싸움을 한 건 아니지?] [윽] [다른 아이에게 들었다. 거짓말을 하면 안돼.]
- 그 때 어머니의 얼굴이 잘 기억나지 않는다. 슬픈 얼굴이었던가? 아니면 두려운 얼굴이었던가?
[역시 그 사람의 아들이구나...]
-어머니는 몹시 힘없는 목소리로 중얼거렸다. - 어머니가 또 쓰러지실까봐 겁이 나서, 나는 얼른 어머니를 침대에 눕혔다. - 그리고, 그리고. -한동안 검싸움을 하지 않았다.

journal.title: The Meaning of Revenge 1
journal.contents:
Talk to the Elf Elder.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Elf Elder

journal.title: The Meaning of Revenge 2
journal.contents:
Argenta hasn't returned yet. Look for her at the Watcher's Tower.

Anu Arendel (Lava River) → Watcher's Tower (Argenta?)
journal.todo_msg: Find Argenta in the Watcher's Tower

journal.title: The Meaning of Revenge 3
journal.contents:
Rambert appeared. Talk to him.

Anu Arendel (Lava River) → Watcher's Tower (Rambert)

journal.title: The Meaning of Revenge 4
journal.contents:
You have found out that the reason why Rambert wanted to become stronger was for revenge.

Anu Arendel (Lava River) → Watcher's Tower (Where Rambert Was)
journal.todo_msg: Rambert disappeared. Try to pull yourself together.
